author: Diana Olick
title: Confidence in housing weakens just as homes become more affordable
description: Lower mortgage rates are making buying a home slightly more affordable, but financial concerns are outweighing that benefit and lowering overall confidence in housing.
content:
Lower mortgage rates are making buying a home slightly more affordable, but financial concerns are outweighing that benefit and lowering overall confidence in housing.
Consumer sentiment in housing fell in September from its August high, according to a month… [+3551 chars]
